description.narrative: The development objective of the proposed project is to increase, in a sustainable manner, the level of involvement of targeted communities in their local development through increasing oil palm revenue and local participation.

condition.narrative: OPIC shall ensure that environmental screening has been completed for each project activity in accordance with the environmentalscreening criteria set out in the EA and EMP
OPIC shall maintain until completion of the project a project office with dedicated staff and to provide adequate funds andresources to project office
OPIC shall not assign, amend, abrogate or waive the Subsidiary Agreement or any of its provisions, except as the Recipient and IDAshall otherwise agree
OPIC shall not waive, amend or abrogate, or allow to be amended, waived or abrogated, any provision of the Project ImplementationManual
The Recipient shall not assign, amend, abrogate or waive the Subsidiary Agreement or any of its provisions, except as IDA shallotherwise agree
The Recipient to establish and maintain until completion of the project, a Project Steering Committee
The project shall be implemented in accordance with the Project Implementation manual, including the Environmental Management Planand the Resettlement Policy Framework
